data.eml:eml: Two new paratanaid Tanaidacea (Crustacea: Malacostraca: Peracarida) from the Hawaiian Islands, with illustrated taxonomic keys

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Morales-Núñez, Andrés G., Pelleteri, Sara, Heard, Richard W. (2016): Two new paratanaid Tanaidacea (Crustacea: Malacostraca: Peracarida) from the Hawaiian Islands, with illustrated taxonomic keys. Zootaxa 4150 (4): 467-492, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4150.4.5
